name: catseye-DAM
description: You've tried the Document Object Model, now try the Document *Awesome* Model

scripts.build:dam-plus-widgets-web: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/dam-plus-widgets-web.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify | terser --compress --mangle | uglifyjs > dist/dam-plus-widgets-web.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:dam && npm run build:dam-plus-widgets-web
